Articles.Content: Maybe I missed how to do it, but something I have been sort of role play irking at. Landing and atmospheric entry with my science bays open! Would be nice if the doors could be manually shut after experiment without having to transmit or ditch the results. Little red light outside to say has been used?

They can be, set up `toggle doors` as an action group assignment.

EDIT: It`s a shame there is not a right click option for it...
